content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f660 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e dreambaby dk paintpot striped baby hat a sweet simple baby hat to go with pattern 2833- dreambaby dk paintpot top down pullover size 3-6 month 9-12 month 18-24 month materials 1 50g ball of dreambaby dk paintpot shown in color 1401 & 1402 needles 16 circ size us 6 set of double pointed needles size 6 1 stitch marker gauge 22 sts 28 row = 4 over st st make sure you get gauge note the 2 smaller sizes will need to be done on the double points from the beginning with circular needle or double points loosely cast on 64 72 80 sts place marker if using circular needle and join into the round taking care not to twist work in st st until total length is 5 5 6 6 5 ending at the marker begin decreases changing to double pointed needles when needed round 1 * k6 k2tog repeat from * around round 2 knit round 3 * k5 k2tog repeat from * around round 4 knit round 5 * k4 k2tog repeat from * around round 6 knit round 7 * k3 k2tog repeat from * around round 8 * k2 k2tog repeat from * around round 9 * k1 k2tog repeat from * around round 10 * k2tog repeat from * around cut yarn weave through remaining sts pull up tight and anchor to the inside weave in all ends ©2015 plymouth yarn company 031315jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es pm = place marker wyif = with yarn in front
